isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB: 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - INNER DOOR HANDLE

step1.para: Remove the window regulator handle, grab handle, ash receptacle (right door only), and door check strap from the lower door cover panel.
Remove the retaining screws from the lower door cover panel, disconnect electrical connectors, if so equipped, and remove the panel.

caution.para: To prevent damage to the door while fully open, re-install the door check strap.

step1.para: Remove the upper retaining screw and washers from the window run channel.
Remove the door lock push button. Take the retaining screws out of the upper door cover panel, remove the remote control rod from door handle, and remove the upper door cover panel.
Remove the nuts and washers securing the door handle to the mounting bracket and remove the door handle.
Install the door handle and secure it to the mounting bracket on the upper door cover panel with the nuts and washers.

Position upper door cover panel and install the remote control rod to the door handle. Install the door lock push button. Install the retaining screws to secure the upper door cover panel. Install the upper retaining screw and washers in the window run channel.
Remove the door check strap from the door temporarily to allow the lower door cover panel to be put back onto the door.
Position the lower door cover panel in place and re-connect electrical connectors, if so equipped. Install the lower door cover panel and secure it with the retaining screws.
Install the window regulator handle, grab handle, ash receptacle (right door only) and door check strap to the lower door cover panel.
